title: Elkharas
description: Khwarazmian site on the bank of the Amu Darya River. The site was excavated in 1973-1975 prior to flooding due to dam construction. The primary occupation at the site is dated from the 6th century BCE-3rd century CE, with evidence of later occupation as late as the 11th century CE.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate location of the Elkharas site prior to its destruction by flooding, after Levina 2001.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Elkharas
